long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DotView allows a very simple management of your Polkadot accounts and preview of their balances!

Features include:
⭐️ Add new watch address 
⭐️ Delete address
⭐️ Look up balances

DotView is powered by Polk4.net and is completely open-source, if you would like new functionality or submit an issue - https://github.com/polk4-net/polk4-web/tree/dot_view

Many more features are coming!

Tags: #polkadot, #blockchain, #crypto
